@fmassa check out the tests to see what it looks like now. Instead of putting each source into a header and including it in `main.cpp`, I just concatenate the sources into a `main.cpp` and a `cuda.cu`. This is equivalent since `#include <...>` is basically concatenating sources :)

Let me know what you think and I'll update the docs
